en-US.label: Call Center Basic
en-US.description: The Call Center app allows you to manage call queues
en-US.extended_description: Call Center exposes agent, manager and administrator settings so that you can enable end users to use call queues as efficiently as possible. Developers/admins can use the queues in callflows (visual or via API) with all other elements in the system. When creating a call queue, administrators have the ability to choose the most effective call routing strategy for their needs, along with personalized hold music and a separate escalation queue if desired.
features: Detailed view for agents to: Log in and start taking calls, See who else is in their queue and what is occurring, Log out or mark themselves as away, See real-time statistics on their daily performance.
BLF indications of current agent state
Estimated and actual wait time tracking
